name: Austria
visaRequirements: Schengen Visa required for most non-EU citizens
languages: English widely spoken in tourist areas

about.description: Austria is a landlocked country in Central Europe known for its stunning Alpine landscapes, classical music heritage, and imperial history. From the elegant streets of Vienna to the snow-capped peaks of the Alps, Austria offers a perfect blend of culture, history, and natural beauty.

travelTips.bestTimeToVisit: April to October for city visits; December to March for winter sports
